name: Donkey Kong 3 (itch)
description:
Playable 3D simulation of this   classic handheld electronic game including views of the original packaging and instruction guide . A RetroFab simulation Version 0.9.5 (alpha) Details Title Donkey Kong 3 Model No. AK-302 Series Game & Watch (Micro Vs. System) Manufacturer Nintendo Release Date August 20, 1984 Chipset Sharp SM511 ( 32.768 kHz ) Description

Donkey Kong and Stanley try to prevent bees from reaching their gardens by forcing the bees towards their rival using bug spray.

Gameplay

Move up and down and shoot clouds of bug spray to push the bees towards your opponent's side. Your canister of bug spray can hold up to 3 shots so use them wisely. When you run out of bug spray you can refill your canister by catching drops of insecticide on your side of the screen.

In the single player game (Game A) Stanley gets 10 points for each bee that reaches Donkey Kong. However, if a bee reaches Stanley, one miss is scored. Three misses and the game is over.

In the two player game (Game B) each player starts with an initial score of 50 points. Whenever a bee touches a player's side of the garden, 1 point is subtracted. When a player's score is 0, or a bee reaches them, one miss is scored. Three misses and the game is over.

Modes

Game A - Single player
Game B - Two player

Controls Controller 1 Up Up Arrow Down Down Arrow Left Left Arrow Right Right Arrow Spray Right Ctrl Controller 2 Up W Down S Left A Right D Spray Left Ctrl Mouse Rotate Drag Press Left-click Zoom Mousewheel Resources Audio David Haywood ( youtube.com ) Box Art Nintandbox ( nintandbox.net ) Instructions Torsten Lindh ( intheattic.co.uk ) Textures Lee Robson ( progettosnaps.net )
